How can I invite a user to my account?

To invite a user to your account, follow these steps:
1. Access Account Management.
2. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization or Ad account.
3. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
4. Fill in the email address of the new user and their role (Admin, Operator, or Viewer) and submit.
5. The new user will receive an email prompting them to make an account or verify their email.
Once verified, they will see your Organization or Ad account listed under their Account Management tab.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to our [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
